title: Gridlock: A Scientific Thriller
description: Gridlock: A scientific thriller. Computer genius Jude Wagner has unlocked mankind’s greatest scientific discovery—the human genome. His invention accelerates the Grid, a vast computer network, making the interpretation of an individual’s DNA lightning fast. In fact, the Grid makes diagnosis of disease affordable to all. The breakthrough heralds the dawn of personalized medicine—and personalized cures. It sparks a healthcare revolution, promising hope for millions. But when Wagner’s closest colleagues die under mysterious circumstances, he's hurled into a battle to protect the Grid, pitting him against a powerful, faceless enemy. Could Wagner be next? To save himself and his invention, he must forestall Gridlock.
author: Alvin Ziegler
